title.narrative: Support to Agro-processing Special Economic Zone Road Map and Promotion of Value-added Exports project

description.narrative: The project supports the agro-processing sub-cluster within the Malawi National Export Strategy (NES) and MGDS II Key Performance Area (KPA) 2.2 by supporting two elements of the Manufacturing Strategy: 1) developing a roadmap and feasibility study for an Agro-Processing Special Economic Zone (AP-SEZ); 2) supporting the Malawi Investment and Trade Centre (MITC) to establish a presence in regional markets to promote Malawian exports in the region as well as attracting tourists, and investment into the AP-SEZ. The returns on the investment into the NES, together with other activities planned under the NES, will be to contribute export of agro-processing products of at least 30 percent of the NES 2017 target or 1.23 percent1 of the total exports. Further, project is expected to contribute in terms of beverage products exports of about 21 percent of the NES 2017 target representing nearly 0.06 percent of total exports by 2017.
